code: import axios from'axios';const url='http://localhost:5000/posts';export const fetchPosts=()=>axios.get(url);export const createPost=newPost=>axios.post(url,newPost);export const likePost=id=>axios.patch("".concat(url,"/").concat(id,"/likePost"));export const updatePost=(id,updatedPost)=>axios.patch("".concat(url,"/").concat(id),updatedPost);export const deletePost=id=>axios.delete("".concat(url,"/").concat(id));
